column1:
Can’t wait for subscription boxes to go Coronavirus themed: 

“Guess what Cheryl! My sub-box is in. I used a coupon from an ex-anti-Vaxx social media influencer for 3travel sized sanitizers at $10 off after the price gouging”
If after this pandemic you still think capitalism "works" you are either an imbecile, a sociopath, or both. #Covid_19 #coronavirus
